name: Wisp AI
long_description: Wisp AI is the executive assistant for everyone — not just CEOs. It manages your calendar, drafts emails, summarizes meetings and notes, and handles your to-dos and reminders. Built for small business owners and busy employees, Wisp saves hours every week by automating admin work — all for a fraction of the cost of a human assistant.
one_liner: Wisp AI is an executive assistant for the everyday user.
